exploreUrl:
<js>
discover = [];
push = (title, url, style) => discover.push({ title: title, url: url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: style } });
addSlots = (count, style) => {
    remainder = count % 3;
    slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("Êî∂ËóèÂ§π", null, 1);
try {
    favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Token‰∏çÂêàÊ≥ïÊàñËÄÖËøáÊúü")) {
        push("Ë¥¶Âè∑Êú™ÁôªÂΩï", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
        favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
    push("Êú™Áü•ÈîôËØØ", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
};
push("Êù•Ê∫ê", null, 1);
providers = ["ÂÖ®ÈÉ®", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    url = provider === "ÂÖ®ÈÉ®" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("Á±ªÂûã", null, 1);
types = ["ÂÖ®ÈÉ®", "ËøûËΩΩ‰∏≠", "Â∑≤ÂÆåÁªì", "Áü≠ÁØá"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {

    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("ÊéíÂ∫è", null, 1);
sorts = ["Êõ¥Êñ∞", "ÁÇπÂáª"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;

loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("Ë¥¶Âè∑");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("ÂØÜÁ†Å");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

[cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]])).filter(Boolean); } else { content = jpContent; } }; regex = content => { displayedImages = new Set(); return JSON.stringify(content).replace(/<ÂõæÁâá>(https?:\/\/[^"\s]+)/g, (_, p1) => { if (displayedImages.has(p1)) return ''; displayedImages.add(p1); return ''; }); }; format = content => content.replace(/^\[|\]$/g, '').split(',').map(item => item.trim().replace(/^"|"$/g, '')).filter(Boolean).map((item, i) => item.startsWith('{"headers"') && i > 0 ? ',' + item : ' ' + item).join("\n"); format(regex(content));

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>

<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36"
	})
})()
</js>

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// Ëé∑ÂèñÂåÖÂê´<li>ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁöÑ<div>ÂÖÉÁ¥†
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// Â∞ÜdivsËΩ¨Êç¢‰∏∫Êï∞ÁªÑ‰ª•‰æøÊéíÂ∫è
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// ÊåâÁÖßdata-idÂ±ûÊÄßÂØπdivArrayËøõË°åÊéíÂ∫è
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// ÈÅçÂéÜÊéíÂ∫èÂêéÁöÑdivArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // Ëé∑ÂèñÂΩìÂâçdiv‰∏ãÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ<li>ÂÖÉÁ¥†
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // ‰ΩøÁî®data-idÂ±ûÊÄß
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//Â§ÑÁêÜÂº∫Âà∂ÁôªÂΩï
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//Ëá™Âä®Â§ÑÁêÜÈ™åËØÅ
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("ÊªëÂä®È™åËØÅ")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("È™åËØÅCookieÔºö" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("Ê£ÄÊµãÂà∞È™åËØÅ,Â∞ùËØïËá™Âä®Â§ÑÁêÜ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "Ëá™Âä®È™åËØÅÂ§±Ë¥•ÔºåËØ∑ÈáçËØï!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//Â§ÑÁêÜÈáçÊñ∞Ëé∑ÂèñÊñáÊú¨Êó∂ÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞ÁöÑÈîôËØØ„ÄÇ
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`Êú™Ëé∑ÂèñÂà∞ÊñáÊú¨ÔºåÊ≠£Âú®ÈáçËØï...ÔºàÂΩìÂâçÁ¨¨${retryCount}Ê¨°ÈáçËØïÔºâ`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "ÈáçËØï‰∏âÊ¨°‰ªçÁÑ∂Êú™Ëé∑ÂèñÂà∞ÊñáÊú¨ÔºåËØ∑Ê£ÄÊü•ÁΩëÁªúÁä∂ÂÜµ„ÄÇ"
}
result;
</js>

	ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
		`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(url)},{'type':''}`;
	}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'üëªipË¢´ÊãâÈªë‰∫Üüëª')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('üíîËÆøÈóÆÂá∫Èîôüíî')
	}

	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(ÂÖ®Êñá|Â∞èËØ¥|ÂÖçË¥πÈòÖËØª|ÊúÄÊñ∞Á´†ËäÇ).*|[(Ôºà].*[Ôºâ)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),

	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(Ê≠£Êñá|VIPÁ´†ËäÇ|Á´†ËäÇÁõÆÂΩï|ÊúÄÊñ∞Á´†ËäÇ)?(\s+|_)|[\(Ôºà„Äê].*[Ê±ÇÊõ¥Ë∞¢‰πêÂèëÊé®].*/g, '') + ' ‚Ä¢ ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '„ÄÄ„ÄÄüî∏ÊúÄËøëÊõ¥Êñ∞Ôºö' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(ËßÇÁúãÂ∞èËØ¥|ÁÆÄ‰ªã)[:Ôºö]|ÂàÜ‰∫´‰π¶Á±ç.*|ÂêÑ‰Ωç‰π¶Âèã.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),

};
